steps: ['Sift together and make 3 holes in dry ingredients', 'In first hole , pour vegetable oil', 'In second hole , pour vinegar', 'In third hole , pour vanilla', 'Pour cold water over all', 'Mix well with fork or whisk , but do not beat', 'Bake in greased 8 x 8 pan for about 35 minutes at 350 deg f']
